[object Object] false ## <a name="awssqsutils"></a>AWSSQSUtils ### Type: `Script Include` ### Class: `AWSSQSUtils` ### Constructor #### `AWSSQSUtils_Initialize variables_` _Initialize variables_ ### Static Properties #### `AWSSQSUtils.testReceiveMessage(queueName)` **Parameters** * `queueName` _*_ --- #### `AWSSQSUtils.testSendMessage(queueName, msg)` **Parameters** * `queueName` _*_ * `msg` _*_ **Returns** * `*` --- ### Methods #### `deleteMessages(queueURL, receiptHandles, credID, taskID)` **Parameters** * `queueURL` _*_ * `receiptHandles` _*_ * `credID` _*_ * `taskID` _*_ **Returns** * `*` --- #### `getDefaultQueueAttributes()` **Returns** * `*` --- #### `getQueueAttributes(queueName)` **Parameters** * `queueName` _*_ **Returns** * `*` --- #### `initialize()` _Initialize variables_ --- #### `receiveMessage(queueName, credID, taskID)` _Pulls in messages from an AWS SNS queue_   **Parameters** * `queueURL` _*_ * `credID` _*_ * `taskID` _*_ * `queueName` _*_ **Returns** * `object` _- contains properties status, responseAttributes, message and httpStatus_ --- #### `receiveMessages(credID)` _Perform a ReceiveMessage action for each active queue_ **Parameters** * `credID` _*_ --- #### `sendMessage(queueName, messageBody, credID, taskID)` _Send a message to an AWS SNS queue - one attempt only_   **Parameters** * `queueName` _*_ * `messageBody` _*_ * `credID` _*_ * `taskID` _*_ **Returns** * `object` _- contains properties status, responseAttributes, message and httpStatus_ --- #### `sendMessageWithRetry(queueName, messageBody, credID, taskID)` _Send a message to an AWS SNS queue and if it fails will attempts a number of retries (set in a system property)_   **Parameters** * `queueName` _string_ * `messageBody` _string_ * `credID` _sys_id_ _- points to a credential record_ * `taskID` _*_ **Returns** * `object` _- contains properties status, responseAttributes, message and httpStatus_ --- #### `triggerSQSAction(targetURL, action, messageBody, credID, taskID)` _Send a message to an AWS resource - one attempt only_   **Parameters** * `targetURL` _*_ * `messageBody` _*_ * `credID` _*_ * `taskID` _*_ * `method` _*_ * `contentType` _*_ * `messageType` _*_ * `action` _*_ **Returns** * `object` _- contains properties status, responseAttributes, message and httpStatus_ --- #### `_getQueueAttr(queueGR)` **Parameters** * `queueGR` _*_ **Returns** * `*` --- #### `_parseResponseXML(responseBody)` **Parameters** * `responseBody` _*_ **Returns** * `*` --- #### `_processMessage(queueGR, message)` **Parameters** * `queueGR` _*_ * `message` _*_ ---

Send a message to an AWS SNS queue and if it fails will attempts a number of retries (set in a system property)
